ISSUE.TITLE: Is not allowed to select closed projects at tickets creation
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Bug Is not allowed to select closed projects in Tickets. Even when a ticket is closed, remains under garantee, and new support tickets can arise over an alreaady closed project. ### Environment Version ALl ### Environment OS All ### Environment Web server All ### Environment PHP All ### Environment Database All ### Environment URL(s) https://myserver.com/ticket/card.php?action=create&idmenu=6596&mainmenu=ticket&leftmenu= ### Expected and actual behavior Now all the closed projects appears in grey color and is not possible to select it when a ticket is created. This force the user to reopen the project, then assign the project to the ticket, and close again the project. ### Steps to reproduce the behavior _No response_ ### Attached files _No response_
